title: mythicmobs和伪装插件报错
author: 龙猫酱~
txt_content:
kl:
  Type: SKELETON
  Display: '&6&l测试怪物'
  Health: 6000
  Damage: 0
  Disguise:
    Type: player
    Player: '玩家'
    Skin: xiao
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: true
    MaxCombatDistance: 25
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    despawn: false
这是怪物配置
[09:53:25 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Task #2310 for MythicMobs v4.7.1-FREE generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.Disguise.setWatcher(Disguise.java:701) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.setWatcher(PlayerDisguise.java:335) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.clone(PlayerDisguise.java:112) ~[?:?]

        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-eb3d921-2b93d83]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_181]
生成怪物没有任何问题 但是每次击杀怪物都会有报错
生成怪物也会有这样的报错
[09:56:50 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Task #2647 for MythicMobs v4.7.1-FREE generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.Disguise.setWatcher(Disguise.java:701) ~[?:?]

怪物插件版本是4.7.1  伪装版本是9.1.2

replies.author: 悠然学院
replies.txt_content:
yweiyang 发表于 2019-12-17 14:41
[14:40:15 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Task #2730 for MythicMobs v4.6.5-2800 generated an exception
java.la ...
https://share.weiyun.com/5CVGZH9刚刚测试了一下。这个版本可行

replies.author: 悠然学院
replies.txt_content: 两个插件的报错都是因为MM插件引起 的，把MM插件版本退回到4.6即可。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 可尝试更换 Lib's Disguises 插件版本

replies.author: 龙猫酱~
replies.txt_content:
